title: Government Online Education Training Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining web-based platform non-face-to-face instruction with offline discussions, focusing on government online training case studies and effective instructional design methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three design principles of web-based education in the government sector
Learners can design at least two interactive content elements for motivating learning
Learners can propose integrated online/offline assessment strategies in blended environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
